ValidationRule.description: Sales Reps cannot leapfrog (skip over) Opportunity Stages for any Opportunity record types.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( ISCHANGED(StageName) && CASE(StageName, "00 - MQL",1, "0 - Identified Prospect Account",2, "1 - Account Exploration",3, "2 - Account Qualification",4, "3 - Consideration",5, "4 - Evaluation",6, "5 - Verbal Commit/LOI",7, "6 - Negotiations",8, "7-Execution",9, "Close Pending",10, "Closed Won",11, "Closed Lost",0, 0) > CASE(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "00 - MQL",1, "0 - Identified Prospect Account",2, "1 - Account Exploration",3, "2 - Account Qualification",4, "3 - Consideration",5, "4 - Evaluation",6, "5 - Verbal Commit/LOI",7, "6 - Negotiations",8, "7-Execution",9, "Close Pending",10, "Closed Won",11, "Closed Lost",0, 0)+1, AND( ISBLANK( CreatedDate ), NOT( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "4 - Evaluation")), OR (RecordType.DeveloperName = "Amendment", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Renewal") ), AND( ISBLANK( CreatedDate ), NOT( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "00 - MQL") ), NOT( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "0 - Identified Prospect Account")), OR (RecordType.DeveloperName = "Products_Services", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Services_Only") )
)
